content.rendered: My neighbour Philippe Malouin. He’s a brilliant furniture and interiors designer from Canada originally but now living on the top floor of my building. His flat is very stylish, not surprisingly! And has great views over Stoke Newington and Hackney. This isn’t the portrait I posted in my daily blog but I think maybe I like it better…
